mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT X.* FROM (SELECT B.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopDetailCategoryStat, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ) X INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY C ON X.universitySeq=C.UNIVERSITYSEQ) Y WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} AND BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ=#{busStopCategorySeq} and busStopDetailCategoryStat ='show' and busStopCategoryStat = 'show' limit 0,3;

SELECT A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq,A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, A.BUSSTOPCATEGORY AS busStopCategory,A.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq FROM BUSSTOP_CATEGORY A INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY B ON A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = B.UNIVERSITYSEQ WHERE A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} and busStopCategoryStat = 'show' limit 0,3
SELECT NOTICESEQ AS noticeSeq, NOTICESUBJECT AS noticeSubject FROM NOTICE where NOTICESTATUS = 'show'
SELECT UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq FROM UNIVERSITY WHERE UNIVERSITYDOMAIN = #{urlStr}
